title: Fort Raleigh National Historic Site: Park Statistics
body: Park Statistics       Visitation There are several reporting systems and studies that document visitation statistics at Fort Raleigh National Historic Site:  Monthly and yearly visitation figures are available through the National Park Service Public Statistics Office. Fort Raleigh National Historic Site Visitor Survey Card Data Report (2008) Outer Banks Group, Fort Raleigh National Historic Site, Visitor Study (2002) Outer Banks Visitors Bureau Visitor Conversion Study (2003)   Â    Acreage Fort Raleigh National Historic Site encompasses 355.45 acres. Designations  1934 Fort Raleigh State Park established (North Carolina Historical Commission) 1941 Fort Raleigh National Historic Site established (NPS) 1966 National Register of Historic Places 2002 National Underground Railroad Network to Freedom
